database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: GNPS Moorea Interactions 2014 UPLC-MS/MS qTOF Maxis
entry.description: A set of benthic interaction samples obtained from ARMS plates in Moorea, Pacific Ocean. Mostly contains Bryozoan and tunicate interactions with samples from colony and interaction zone. Extracted in ethyl acetate and methanol.
